scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && cp -R src/protos lib && cp src/schema.graphql lib
scripts.start: yarn build && source ./exportLocal.sh && node lib/entrypoint/graphql.js | pino-pretty -c -l
scripts.trigger: yarn build && source ./exportLocal.sh && node lib/entrypoint/trigger.js | pino-pretty -c -l
scripts.remove-charts: helm uninstall lnd | helm uninstall lnd-outside-1 | helm uninstall lnd-outside-2 | helm uninstall bitcoind | helm uninstall galoy
scripts.forward-mongodb: kubectl port-forward $(kubectl get pods -l app.kubernetes.io/name=mongodb | awk '/mongo/ {print $1}') 27017
scripts.restart-charts: yarn use-minikube && yarn remove-charts || : && sleep 5 && yarn run add-charts
scripts.test-local-clean: yarn run restart-charts && yarn jest --clearCache && yarn run test-local
scripts.test-local: yarn use-minikube && source ./exportLocal.sh && yarn jest --runInBand --verbose $TEST | pino-pretty -c -l
scripts.cron: yarn build && source exportLocal.sh && node src/entrypoint/cron.js
scripts.exporter: yarn build && source exportLocal.sh && node src/entrypoint/exporter.js
scripts.lnd-connection: source exportLocal.sh && echo $MACAROON | base64 -d > ./macaroon && echo $TLS | base64 -d > ./tls.cert && lncli --network regtest --macaroonpath=./macaroon --tlscertpath=./tls.cert --rpcserver=${LNDIP}:${LNDRPCPORT} getinfo
scripts.lncli: source exportLocal.sh && echo $MACAROON | base64 -d > ./macaroon && echo $TLS | base64 -d > ./tls.cert && lncli --network regtest --macaroonpath=./macaroon --tlscertpath=./tls.cert --rpcserver=${LNDIP}:${LNDRPCPORT}
